#summary Instructions on installing the plugin

= Instructions Using Wordpress =

1) Export the latest release

{{{
svn export http://gvlarp-character-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/tags/version1-8 gvlarp-character
}}}

2) Zip the folder

3) Log into the admin account on the wordpress website

4) De-activate the character plugin, if already installed

5) Delete the plugin entirely (don't worry - you aren't deleting the database tables so nothing will be lost)

6) Add New Plugin -> upload

7) Activate Plugin

= Instructions Using FTP =

1) Deactivate the plugin via Wordpress admin

2) Export the latest release

{{{
svn export http://gvlarp-character-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/tags/version1-8 gvlarp-character
}}}

3) Upload the exported files to {{{/public_html/wp-content/plugins/gvlarp-character/}}}

4) Re-activate the plugin

= After Installation =

1) Go to Characters->Configuration. Check any new options and click \[save options\] and any other save button with new options/sections

2) Go through version log and make any appropriate page content/data table/menu updates

== V1.8 to V1.9 ==

  * New options in configuration to update
  * google feeding map options
  * Remove Player Admin page
  * Remove Path Upadate page/shortcode

  * Setup google map
